post.body: I just saw bits of that performance a few days ago at my friend's house! Hilarious!
CLOVERFIELD did a alternate reality game. I was obsessed with it
This is hilarious! the story of your voodoo bread!
I am diggin this interview between Abi, Brandon, YJ, and Spooky. Hilarious!
I found this. Have you yet? http://tinyurl.com/5v9vz9
good day to you, sir. i am waiting for my class to start filtering through the door.
French Camp? Is that the name of a town? It sounds like a terrific name for a title of something
I am not certain what kind of squid it is just yet. I still need to gather my team of scientists to investigate it further
Its so demented to see a squid with elbows. It made me shiver. Its fascinating though
thanks for the info!
What time? I will synchronize my watch
I am looking forward to it
@Andys_Angels_3 very cool! I am excited to be with the angels for this interview
I thought our interview was now?
What is your skype name? I am trying to call you and get through
I am trying to call frank. what is his skype name?
I just finally read this. I dig the new videos. Stick Around and the cop one. I like the credits at the end
good day to you!
I am just now starting the special report
I got my wisdom teeth pulled eons ago. I suggest you get knocked out for it. Waking up in that haze is a fun experience
very cool! thank you for the info! @Hyperkinetic no new ones yet today. you?
welcome back... http://tinyurl.com/2ykqmc
Yeah, that EAPoe story is fantastic! All stories about coincidences astound me. Even ones we think are insignificant
summary: 3 men, each named Hugh Williams, on 3 separate occasions, survived sinking ships.
yes, I am on constant investigation mode to try and get some of the mystery solved
thanks for the convenience
I noticed that you mentioned alan in your tweet and figured you might be speaking about abel
I still am carless. luckily, I have been getting sub jobs at north hollywood hs and walking to work lately
you're welcome! yr santa story sounds scary! @briancrownz, thanks for the link!
I was just discussing the same things with some students today. we were talking about NLP
I am still searching around. doing various combinations of kaufman/maddox/mccoy in the search field
yes, my Blues Brothers appearance fails to appear on the Nathan McCoy page
yes, we are the sane ones. the world is the crazy one
have a serendipitous day!
I try different search engines. this time I used www.askjeeves.com sometimes I try www.altavista.com or www.dogpile.com
y'know, the Jolie kid. He's been up to a lot over the past years apparently
you are hilarious. yes, i just might waste away looking for all these Maddox's
didn't mean to drown you! hehe! @Hyperkinetic thank you so much!
c is for carla who wasted away
I am sorry to hear about the news. I shall be transmitting the good vibes to you and your family today. She is free now
good morning. and good morning to the rest of you. you know who you are
Thank you for taking a gander!
Thanks so much for checking it out! I just sent some music and changes to my buddy and it should be up within the week!
What are you recording? I fell asleep, thinking it would be a short nap. I just awoke from a nightmare. The creeps will disappear soon
I am listening to the new ons. hilarious work, frank
I dig the new song! fantastic stuff
there is a song on www.myspace.com/curtmusic5 called Dimension 5, which you might be interested in
I feel the same way
No wonder you are scareded! Those are some spooky videos!
have you gone into the recording studio yet? have you written some songues?
I just saw your Rampler video! Excellente'!
yes, i just rediscovered it today. the fella seems honest.
great stuff
the videos are turning out fantastically!
precisely
i am excited to hear the recordings!
old news to you. gnu news to me. i don't know what to do with that information. afraid of having my microchip shut off
going well! i have been showing "army of darkness" to the high schoolers today. they are astounded
Currently in Arizona for a funeral. Checking out the Nathan McCoy youtube video
....is the other fella who arrived after john titor
http://tinyurl.com/6lyf5d
Creepy creeperton
Shot by Shell Oil Robot. It sounds so spooky
Good day, Puzzlementarians and nonnPuzzlementarians, alike! Does the following footage make your spine shiver? http://tinyurl.com/6rueqw
Good day, my fellow/former Puzzlementarians!
Happy Thanksgiving to all the Puzzlementarians and non-Puzzlementarians, alike
a real time machine.... http://tinyurl.com/2xms74
http://tinyurl.com/6orj29
...quoth the raven
Also, for the Edgar Allan Poe lovers out there... http://www.psychics.co.uk/coincidences/cannibal.html
....all found here: http://www.odd-info.com/history.htm
I've always been a firm supporter and advocate of coincidences. This story illustrates just how deep it can get... http://tinyurl.com/59js8a
Search for the name Hugh Williams on this page... http://www.odd-info.com/history.htm Is there a connection with Kaufman's Huey Williams?
another imdb page... http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0534687/
Also, I've been poking around and found this... http://www.cinematical.com/profile/471384/
nathan mccoy's imdb page... http://www.imdb.com/name/nm1430420/
Lyndzee Grummond, another time traveler... http://tinyurl.com/6ftoar
Stephen D. Maddox is in this cast list... http://tinyurl.com/6cod4k
no wait...k is for karla who wasted away...i think
and here is a page where Maddox has music up... http://www.mysoulgen.com/profile/SteveMD
Looks kinda like this one... http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0534687/
Its intriguing how this Stephen Maddox... http://www.stephenmaddox.com/
And this... http://stephenmaddox.lawoffice.com/
Check out this little nugget I just found about Maddox... http://www.hillbarntheatre.org/redesign/
my response to the Gorey madness can be found in a song on www.myspace.com/curtmusic5 called "Gashleycrumb Tinies"
another review by someone some of us know... http://www.amazon.com/review/RGBO9G6COPA42
If the computer here had the latest flash player, I'd be able to check this out... http://tinyurl.com/5ndtcd
Good morning folks. About to venture off into the rain to substitute teach the future of America
Just saw a screening of Benjamin Button at the DGA... http://tinyurl.com/5d8rjn
listening to http://www.theovernightscape.com/archives/346
Listening to http://onsug.com/archives/392
Good morning folks. Terrific to see you again.
to the wrestler inside each one of you... http://tinyurl.com/7l3ut6
painting like a madman.
This is also something that is intriguing... http://www.andykaufmanlives.com/twit
http://tinyurl.com/3l57m5 is something some of us have yet to read
Or heck, even send me an email.... dragotch@aol.com
to my fellow Puzzlementarians, can you please DM me any email addresses you have associated with Mad-man? I am continuing my investigations
Here is a blast from the past for those who are interested... http://www.bradblog.com/?p=159
Good day one and all. About to head to work and show the rest of "Army of Darkness" to the Future of America... http://tinyurl.com/2k5cpb
by the way, good morning, my fellow Puzzlementarians
